column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We waited for at least half an hour by the bar
column2: and then went to go check in with the hostess regarding our seats as we had expected to be seated closer to the time of our reservation. I was happy to wait as I wasn't in a hurry
column3: but would have definitely been frustrated by this if I were on a tight schedule that night. It didn't feel as though a reservation helped us secure a table for the time that we had intended to eat around.
